quoteLast: , in one hour and forty minutes from the Col, we turned the _bergschrund_, and were fairly on its upper edge, clinging to an ice-step which promised to be only the first of an unpleasantly long series.

quoteFirst: 30 an enemy's biplane dropped four bombs on our Headquarters camp and got away with hardly a shot fired at it. At 7.50 an enemy's Taube came over and dropped bombs near my Signal Tent, also a little summer shower of small steel darts: five men were wounded. At
quoteLast: yet another enemy biplane circled round but was kept at a respectful distance by the ship's guns.
